nodes.text: Maz and the Gigantic Blorp – Chapter 2
"Maz and the Gigantic Blorp – Chapter 2" is the seventh episode of the animated shorts series Star Wars Roll Out. It was first released September 20, 2019 on YouTube.
The blorp is absorbing everything and everyone in its path on Takodana! Maz Kanata must think fast to save her castle, her guests, and herself.
In the opening credits, BB-8 and a Star Wars ball lead the way followed by Rey, Maz Kanata, Finn, Captain Phasma, two stormtroopers, Ben Solo, Han Solo, Chewbacca, and three porgs.

At Takodana Castle, the guests blast the giant green Blorp, which has consumed the two skull-faced guests and several others. However, their blaster bolts have little effect on the green blorp, which absorbs their blast. A brown-skinned humanoid with a turban tries to attack the blorp with a large hammer against Maz Kanata's advice. He to is consumed.

The three Hassks sigh in defeat. Just then, a hippo-faced alien proposes an idea to Maz. As the patrons blast the green blorp, Maz then charges with a giant power cable into the blorp and is also consumed. She dives into the depths of the creature's mass. The alien guests are despondent but the loadlifter droid HURID-327 activates a nearby power generator, which sucks out electrical currents from the green blorp into a gun turret at the top of Maz Kanata's castle.

The Crimson Corsair Sidon Ithano fires several blasts, which cause the giant blorp to shrink and deflate, freeing Maz and the other guests. Maz shakes her head angrily at the two skull-faced guests, who were the blorp's captors. She looks with pity on the shrunken green blorp.

HURID-327 sets the two skull-faced guests to work repairing holes in the wall of her Maz's castle. Three diminutive pink-faced aliens serve the liberated green blorp a pink juice from a cylinder, which it sucks out with a straw. Maz pats the green blorp gently and they all laugh happily.
